definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Questionnaires are easy to administer confidentially.
sentences.chinese: 調查表容易機密地管理。

sentences.english: A 14-question scale is used to determine whether folks have Type D.
sentences.chinese: 一份14項調查表是用於決定是否具有D型性格。
我要拿一份事故調查表，是嗎？

sentences.english: After I filled out a questionnaire, a uniformed officer led me to the kennels.
sentences.chinese: 填了調查表後，一個穿制服的職員把我帶到了狗房。

sentences.english: On the first day of your period, you fill out a questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 在月經來潮第一天，填寫調查表。

sentences.english: And children in the experiment group were required to fill in the Group Activity Viewpoint Questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 對實驗組學生還進行團體活動觀點調查表的填寫。

sentences.english: A Questionnaire can be quite inexpensive to administer.
sentences.chinese: 一個調查表能相當廉宜管理。

sentences.english: Use only the same type of the transmission fluid as specified in the owner's manual or on the dipstick.
sentences.chinese: 只使用同一類型的輸送流體按主人的手冊或調查表。

sentences.english: 2b Listen again and fill in the questionnaire.
Said Mr. Wells after he had collected all of the surveys he had passed out.
sentences.chinese: 威爾士先生把所有發出去的調查表收上來之後說道。

sentences.english: If you like defusing explosives, you'll love creating surveys.
sentences.chinese: 如果喜歡捅馬蜂窩，你就會喜愛調查表。

sentences.english: Finish your questionnaire with your group members.
sentences.chinese: 與同組成員完成調查表。

sentences.english: Another downfall of most surveys is that they try to do too much.
sentences.chinese: 另一個大多數調查表的敗筆是有太多的問題。

sentences.english: The completed questionnaire will be collected by an officer from the Census and Statistics Department.
sentences.chinese: 政府統計處會派員收回填妥的調查表。

sentences.english: Complete the form. Then report it to your class.
sentences.chinese: 做一個調查表，每組派一名同學向全班學生彙報。

sentences.english: The user is then presented with this second questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 然後，向用戶呈現該調查表。

definition: loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
Huwei town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
